fsrtool.name: fsrtool_user_fullapi
fsrtool.structure: CREATE TABLE `fsrtool_user_fullapi` ( `charID` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `userName` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `keyID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `vCODE` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `corpID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `allyID` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `accessMask` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `status` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `lowfueltime` mediumint(9) DEFAULT '24', `errorcount` tinyint(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`corpID`,`allyID`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
